item.title: About
item.description: I’m Bartosz Feński. I live in a lovely located, beautiful city of Bielsko-Biała. I’m quite experienced sysadmin focused on *nix like systems and great supporter of OpenSource / FreeSoftware movements.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me by phone +48 602-383-548 or by email bartosz@fenski.pl. You might want to use GPG key to encrypt your message.
